https://tmrev.io/movie/104194-10 Plus 10 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7jgTH8Qmu4SsoU7a3QV65I1joeI.jpg 10+10 is a project initiated by the Taipei Golden Horse Film Festival to demonstrate the solidarity between Taiwanese film-makers. 20 directors are invited to make a 5-minute short film each on the theme of the “Uniqueness of Taiwan,” but allowed total freedom in all other aspects. 10 Plus 10
